entry.title: Derby Originals 48” Superior Slow Feed Soft Mesh Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 13.95

     

    Derby Originals Superior Slow Feed Soft Mesh Hanging Hay Nets for Horses offer a superior slow feeding option to traditional hay nets. Unlike standard hay nets, which are made of brittle and easily fraying and breaking poly rope, our hay nets are made from soft mesh rope that has an incredibly high breaking strength, is long-lasting, and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and eat from and are more gentle on their teeth and gums than traditional hay nets or other feeders. Our hay nets are available in a wide array of sizes and colors so that you can find the perfect net for you and your horse!


    Please be aware that all Derby Originals soft mesh hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.

     

    • PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.
    • IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.
    • REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.
    • EXCLUSIVE SOFT MESH DESIGN - our slow feed hay nets are made from a soft but durable poly rope that is better for your horse's teeth and gum health and more comfortable to eat from than hard metal feeders and traditional hay nets.
    • HOLDS APPROX. 5-7 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 5-7 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.title: Derby Originals 42" Economy 1" Slow Feed Hay Net for Mini Horses and Livestock Holds 1-2 Flakes of Hay
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 7.95

This hay net is designed for use with smaller horses and livestock and is designed to only hold 1-2 flakes of hay. This hay net is made from thinner 1mm material and is not designed for use with full-sized horses or larger livestock, as they may damage the hay nets during use.

 

Product Features

ECONOMY POLY ROPE DESIGN - this hay net is made of an economy poly rope material that is 1mm in thickness and designed for use with smaller horses and livestock such as miniature horses and ponies, goats, sheep, and more.

HOLDS 1-2 FLAKES - this 42” ultra-slow feed hay net will hold approx. 1-2 flakes of hay, depending on the hay type and flake size, and how dense the hay is packed. These nets are ideal for use in the trailer or for single feedings.

PERFECT FOR LIVESTOCK - this hay net has a smaller 1x1” opening size that is ideal for smaller livestock animals such as sheep, goats, and miniature horses who may eat too fast from or get hooves caught in larger hay nets.

FEED YOUR HORSE MORE NATURALLY - this hay net makes your animal eat slower, which mimics natural grazing and is proven to reduce colic, lower the risk of stomach ulcers, and prevent boredom and destructive behaviors.

AVAILABLE IN FIVE FUN COLORS - these hay nets are available in five colors to best suit you and your animal's needs: Royal Blue, Black, Lime Green, Purple, and Red.

entry.title: Derby Originals 42” Classic Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 7.95

Product Description and Bullet Points:

Derby Originals 42” Classic Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses are the perfect everyday slow feeding option for your horses. These sturdy hay nets are made from a durable poly rope that is long-lasting and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and are great for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay. Our hay nets are available in a wide array of colors so that you can find the perfect net for you and your horse!


Please be aware that all Derby Originals slow feed hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.


PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.

IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.

REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.

DURABLE MULTI-PURPOSE DESIGN - our hay nets are made from a mold, mildew, and UV resistant poly rope that is resistant to breaking and tearing, making these nets ideal for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay.

HOLDS APPROX. 4-6 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 4-6 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.

entry.summary:

Type: Hay Nets
Price: 12.99

Designed with smaller size holes for slower feeding and better digestion, these 36" rope hay nets are perfect for holding hay at shows.

entry.title: Derby Originals 90” Giant Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hay Nets
Price: 24.95

Product Description and Bullet Points:

Derby Originals 90” Giant Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses were designed to better fit your needs than traditional hay nets. Most other hay nets are only 36” or 42” long and can only hold a few flakes of hay. Our 57” hay nets can hold up to 12 flakes or a full bale of hay, while our massive 90” hay net can hold up to 18 flakes or 1.5 bales of hay. This larger capacity makes these large slow feed hay nets great for use with multiple animals, for providing hay for multiple feedings, or for use out in the pasture.

Derby Originals 48” Quik-Fil Slow Feed Hanging Hay Net for Horses are the perfect everyday slow feeding option for your horses. These sturdy hay nets are made from a durable poly rope that is long-lasting and is UV, mold, and mildew resistant. Our Quik-Fil hay nets also have a flexible rope ring sewn into the body of the hay net which keeps the top of the net open and makes feeding a breeze compared to standard hay nets. Our slow feed hay nets have been carefully designed to be comfortable for your horse to use and are great for daily individual and group feeding, use while trailering, and for soaking hay.


Please be aware that all Derby Originals slow feed hay nets are made by hand, and may have slight variation in overall size and the size of the openings. All measurements and capacities listed are approximate. The amount of hay that our hay nets can hold varies greatly due to the type of hay being fed, the dimensions of the hay bale, and the size of the hay flake.


EXCLUSIVE QUIK-FIL DESIGN - this hay net has a flexible rope ring sewn into the body of the hay net which keeps the top of the net open and easily accessible during filling. This added rope ring makes feeding a breeze compared to standard hay nets.

PREVENTS EXCESS HAY WASTAGE - our slow feed hay nets are designed to help you save money and reduce waste by over 50%. These hay nets prevent hay from being scattered or soiled which is beneficial to your horse's health as well as your wallet.

IMPROVES YOUR HORSE'S DIGESTION - hay nets allow you to slow feed your horse, which mimics natural grazing patterns and is proven to aid the digestive process. Slow feeding is recommended by veterinarians to prevent gastric ulcers and colic.

REDUCES BOREDOM - horses are designed to spend up to 16 hours a day grazing. Slow feeding replicates this natural behavior and keeps your horse occupied longer, which helps to prevent boredom-based bad behaviors such as chewing, cribbing, and pacing.

HOLDS APPROX. 5-7 FLAKES - this slow feed hay net can hold about 5-7 flakes or up to a half of a 2-string or square bale of hay. These hay nets are great for everyday feeding and can be used in stalls, trailers, and pastures.
